title: Wii Triple Crown Championship Snowboarding [S3CENR] [WBFS]
description:
Was busy filling gaps in my Wii collection over the weekend, so thought I should start to share them with you guys too! Please seed, or else... :-) 

Game Name [ID] [FORMAT] : Wii Triple Crown Championship Snowboarding [S3CENR] [WBFS]
Language                : ENGLISH (maybe others, not checked)
Type                    : Snowboarding

** IMPORTANT **
Please seed to at least 200%/2.0 each (I have my uTorrent set to 1000%/10.0 !!) 
Do not just leech and run - help others get a chance to download it quickly too. I'm doing this to help, please try to seed for as long as you can.

If you like it, maybe buy a Wii game that is not in my list, or here on TPB and upload it for the rest of us to have too - Thanks! :-)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Most of my 800+ Wii games are listed here (text file format directory listing):             <a href="
http://txt.do/0v5n" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://txt.do/0v5n</a>

Feel free to search it and see if there is a missing one you want me to upload - add a request in the comments and i'll try to help out.

Please Google the title or game ID if you want to know about this or any of the other games, as I can't remember half of them myself to answer any questions. Also check YouTube for a review/demo of games, as some are pretty crap (like Ninjabread Man and the Billy the Wizard). Those are just for OCD people like me who simply *must* get all Wii games out there...
